The British School of Guangzhou
Dear Primary and Secondary parents,
For this year’s Chinese event we have organised a Chinese Activity Carousel, secondary singing students and also a dragon dance show by staff.
On next Friday 24th of January, we would like all our students to enter the spirit of the day by dressing up in a Chinese outfit or in red, yellow or gold colour clothing.
8:00am Chinese singing from some secondary students—Theatre
9:45am Dragon dance show by staff---Secondary football pitch
8:30—12:00 Chinese Activity Carousel
Below are the Chinese activities children will be doing next Friday.
Year 2
Chinese Spinning Top, Chinese Bo Lang drum, Chinese puzzle,
Chinese hand drum
Year 3
Chinese Bo Lang drum , Chinese spinning top, Chinese hand drum
Year 4
Chinese umbrella, Chinese bottle gourd, Chinese folding fan, Chinese lantern
Year 5
Chinese folding fan, Chinese hand drum, Beijing opera mask
Year 6
Beijing opera mask, Kite making
Happy Chinese New Year!
Ms. Alison Liu (Head of Chinese Department)
The British School of Guangzhou
World Class Education
